rule.title: Images must contain only one sub image
rule.description: Images must contain only one sub image
rule.assert: Each IFD must have a sub-ifd

rule.title: Images must contain sub images
rule.description: Images must contain sub images
rule.assert: Each IFD must have a sub-ifd

rule.title: The resolution X of the sub image (full resolution) must be greater than the main (thumbnail) image
rule.description: The resolution X of the sub image (full resolution) must be greater than the main (thumbnail) image
rule.assert: Sub-ifd width must be greater than thumbnail IFD

rule.title: The resolution Y of the sub image (full resolution) must be greater than the main (thumbnail) image
rule.description: The resolution Y of the sub image (full resolution) must be greater than the main (thumbnail) image
rule.assert: Sub-ifd height must be greater than thumbnail IFD

rule.title: The tag NewSubFileType is mandatory
rule.description: The tag NewSubFileType is mandatory

rule.title: Check valid cardinality for tag NewSubFileType
rule.description: Check valid cardinality for tag NewSubFileType

rule.title: Check valid value for tag NewSubFileType
rule.description: Check valid value for tag NewSubFileType

rule.title: Check valid value for tag NewSubFileType on thumbnail image
rule.description: Check valid value for tag NewSubFileType on thumbnail image
rule.assert: NewSubfileType must be 1 for main IFDs

rule.title: Check valid value for tag NewSubFileType on full resolution image
rule.description: Check valid value for tag NewSubFileType on full resolution image
rule.assert: NewSubfileType must be 0 for thumbnail IFDs

rule.title: Images must contain sub images with the full resolution image
rule.description: Images must contain sub images with the full resolution image

rule.title: Check image representation of thumbnail stored in strips (instead of tiles)
rule.description: Check image representation of thumbnail stored in strips (instead of tiles)
rule.assert: Thumbnail image must be stored in strips

rule.title: Check mandatory tag ImageDescription exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag ImageDescription exists

rule.title: Check mandatory tag SamplesPerPixel exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag SamplesPerPixel exists

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag ImageLength
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag ImageLength

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag ImageWidth
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag ImageWidth

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag Compression
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag Compression

rule.title: Check mandatory tag XResolution exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag XResolution exists

rule.title: Check mandatory tag YResolution exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag YResolution exists

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag XResolution
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag XResolution

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag YResolution
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag YResolution

rule.title: Check mandatory tag Make exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag Make exists

rule.title: Check mandatory tag Model exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag Model exists

rule.title: Check mandatory tag Software exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag Software exists

rule.title: Check mandatory tag Copyright exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag Copyright exists

rule.title: Check mandatory tag DateTimeOriginal exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag DateTimeOriginal exists

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag DateTimeOriginal
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag DateTimeOriginal

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag DateTime
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag DateTime

rule.title: Check mandatory tag TIFFEPStandardID exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag TIFFEPStandardID exists

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag TIFFEPStandardID
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag TIFFEPStandardID

rule.title: Check tag CompressedBitsPerPixel does not exist in uncompressed images
rule.description: Check tag CompressedBitsPerPixel does not exist in uncompressed images
rule.assert: CompressedBitsPerPixel tag is forbidden when Compression is 1

rule.title: Check thumbnail image is uncompressed
rule.description: Check thumbnail image is uncompressed
rule.assert: Compression must be 1 for the thumbnail

rule.title: Check valid values for tag PhotometricInterpretation
rule.description: Check valid values for tag PhotometricInterpretation
rule.assert: Photometric Interpretation value must be 1, 2, 6, 32803 or 32767

rule.title: Check mandatory tag PlanarConfiguration exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag PlanarConfiguration exists

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag PlanarConfiguration
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag PlanarConfiguration

rule.title: Check valid values for tag PlanarConfiguration
rule.description: Check valid values for tag PlanarConfiguration

rule.title: Check mandatory tag PlanarConfiguration exists
rule.description: Check mandatory tag PlanarConfiguration exists

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag ResolutionUnit
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag ResolutionUnit

rule.title: Check valid values for tag ResolutionUnit
rule.description: Check valid values for tag ResolutionUnit

rule.title: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag Orientation
rule.description: Check cardinality valid for mandatory tag Orientation

rule.title: Check valid values for tag Orientation
rule.description: Check valid values for tag Orientation

rule.title: Check valid combination of values related to photometric interpretation
rule.description: Check valid combination of values related to photometric interpretation

rule.title: Check valid values for tag TimeZoneOffset
rule.description: Check valid values for tag TimeZoneOffset
rule.assert: TimeZoneOffset value must be between -12 and 11

rule.title: Check valid values for tag ExposureProgram
rule.description: Check valid values for tag ExposureProgram
rule.assert: ExposureProgram value must be between 0 and 8 or greater than 32767

rule.title: Check valid values for tag MeteringMode
rule.description: Check valid values for tag MeteringMode
rule.assert: MeteringMode value must be between 0 and 4 or greater than 32767

rule.title: Check valid values for tag Flash
rule.description: Check valid values for tag Flash

rule.title: Check valid values for Ycbcr images
rule.description: Check valid values for Ycbcr images

rule.title: Check forbidden tag PrimaryChromaticities does not exist
rule.description: Check forbidden tag PrimaryChromaticities does not exist

rule.title: Check forbidden tag WhitePoint does not exist
rule.description: Check forbidden tag WhitePoint does not exist

rule.title: Check forbidden tag TransferFunction does not exist
rule.description: Check forbidden tag TransferFunction does not exist

rule.title: Check valid values for tag FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
rule.description: Check valid values for tag FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
rule.assert: FocalPlaneResolutionUnit value must be between 1 and 5

rule.title: Check valid values for tag SensingMethod
rule.description: Check valid values for tag SensingMethod
rule.assert: SensingMethod value must be between 0 and 8
